short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looks up online Oxford Advanced Learner's Dictionary for the selected text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click any word and look up the definition from Oxford Advanced Learner's Dictionary by selecting Oxford Dictionary from context menu
